Source.Name: fs-uae-dev
Source.Summary: Multi-platform Amiga emulator based on WinUAE (Development Version).
Source.Description: FS-UAE integrates the most accurate Amiga emulation code available from WinUAE. FS-UAE emulates A500, A500+, A600, A1200, A1000, A3000 and A4000 models, but you can tweak the hardware configuration and create customized Amigas.

Package.Name: fs-uae-dev
